title: Very bad!
review: I'm usually not interested in this kind of movie. I watched it because there are two actors in the cast that I know, we were together in two short films. The film is produced by a company named Picture Perfect, but it is far from what can be called perfect. In fact, it's exactly the opposite, everything is very bad, a waste of time for everyone.

title: Horrible
review: School plays are much better. The characters suck at acting, their lines were really predictable and the setting really poor.

title: awful, terrible....
review: How did these so called film-makers get the money to make this tripe?...honestly my 5 year old has more talent...please DO NOT make a film again!!! Shame I had to give it 1 star...it really doesn't deserve that
